description: Design a ride-sharing system that supports operations such as requesting a ride, assigning a driver, completing a ride, and querying driver or passenger status. The system should efficiently match passengers with available nearby drivers and track ongoing rides.

examples.explanation: Initialize system with 5 drivers. Alice requests a ride, Bob is assigned, ride completes, 4 drivers remain available.

constraints: At most 10^4 operations will be made
Driver and passenger names are unique strings
All ride IDs are positive integers
